title: Client Disconnecting
body: Every time we try to start a game, the client keeps disconnecting for all my friends and I

replies.body: I've been seeing a few reports on this!  I'm looking to find if there's anything going on, and will update you.
same there is a bug apparently they are working on it

> [{quoted}](name=Master Scyther,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=otLilXFP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-28T23:07:27.752+0000)
>
> same there is a bug apparently they are working on it

on a side note i havent been dodged from ques because of it it just says its disconnected but it works normally so its a weird bug
Same. Caused me to get a dodge timer on my ranked game!!!!!!!!
